job_tasks.phrase: Research and develop solutions for audio / video data generation of humans in video
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the core activity of researching and developing models for a specific generative task (text-to-video synthesis of humans).

job_tasks.phrase: Design methods and tools for data processing to create pre-training and fine-tuning data-sets
job_tasks.justification: This describes the crucial step of preparing and managing data, which is essential for training and fine-tuning generative models.

job_tasks.phrase: Investigate and propose new tools and infrastructure to accelerate the development of state-of-the-art models
job_tasks.justification: While related to model development, the focus on 'tools and infrastructure' and 'accelerate development' leans towards the engineering and integration aspects of making model development efficient.

job_tasks.phrase: Design and run experiments to evaluate model outcomes for model training on our large scale compute cluster (petabyte scale data, multi-node, multi-GPU model training)
job_tasks.justification: This describes the experimental process of training and evaluating models, a core task in ML/GenAI development.

job_tasks.phrase: Deliver production-ready solutions for deployment in our data and model training pipelines
job_tasks.justification: This phrase clearly indicates the task of building and deploying software solutions that are ready for production, fitting the definition of software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Take ownership of the engineering developments necessary to ship new AI models into product
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the responsibility for the engineering aspects of bringing AI models to market, which is a software development and integration task.

job_tasks.phrase: Communicate and collaborate across London, Amsterdam, Munich and Zurich research offices
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to the need for effective communication and collaboration with distributed teams.

soft_skills.phrase: Communicate and collaborate across London, Amsterdam, Munich and Zurich research offices
soft_skills.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions communication and collaboration as a requirement.

profile.rationale: The job ad describes a role that involves significant work on generative AI tasks, specifically text-to-video synthesis of humans. It requires research and development of solutions for data generation (1.B.1), data processing for datasets (1.B.3), and designing/running experiments for model training (1.B.1). Crucially, it also emphasizes delivering 'production-ready solutions for deployment' and 'engineering developments necessary to ship new AI models into product' (1.A.1), indicating a strong software engineering component. The balance between core AI model development and the engineering required to deploy these models, coupled with the explicit focus on Generative AI (text-to-video, foundational models for humans), aligns best with the 'Core GenAI Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about the tasks involved, explicitly mentioning research, development, data processing, experimentation, and delivering production-ready solutions for AI models. The focus on 'Generative AI space' and 'text-to-video' clearly defines the AI specialization. The blend of these tasks strongly supports the assigned profile.
